thread.section_title: Hotel Trinite Haussmann - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Mahlia
thread.title_full: Mahlia - Review of Hotel Trinite Haussmann, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Vrillie
title: Mahlia
text:
The hotel is very clean and new. Helpful staff.
Pigalle has been gentrified completely. No longer is it a seedy neighbourhood but artsy, young and buzzing. There are a lot of newly established boutique hotels here. And there are also lots of restaurants, art stores, music shops, chocolatiers, hair salons and even a couple of single artist museums.
